topics.name: Jerry Framework Introduction
topics.summary: Introduction to Jerry as a Claude Code plugin with skills for mitigating context rot, problem solving frameworks (general and NASA SE), orchestration, transcription, and work tracker services. Announcement of open source release with MIT license.

topics.name: Claude MD and Skills Optimization
topics.summary: Need to optimize the Claude MD file and skills by applying best practices including decomposition and imports.

topics.name: Orchestration Planning
topics.summary: Creating an orchestration plan using NASA SE and problem solving skill agents with adversarial critics in feedback loops.

topics.name: Best Practices Research
topics.summary: Research on Claude Code plugin, skill, and CLAUDE.md best practices. Creating documentation, synthesizing into rules and patterns, and creating runbooks/playbooks.

topics.name: GitHub Repository Strategy
topics.summary: Renaming current Jerry repository and creating a new public-facing repository for the open source release.

topics.name: User Experience and Documentation
topics.summary: Creating runbooks and playbooks with critic feedback loops considering different user knowledge levels (ELI5, engineer, architect perspectives).

topics.name: Work Tracker Skill Completion
topics.summary: Finishing the work tracker skill by extracting content from ClaudeMD, decomposing, leveraging imports, and writing rules for contextual loading.

topics.name: Project 008 Feature Creation
topics.summary: Creating a new feature in project 008 specifically for preparing Jerry for the OSS release.
